Instance.description: Class that creates an object with a given tag, having a value between min_value and max_value and a value greater than or equal to the value of the participant type.
Instance.parents: CreateObjectDefinitionPickerInteraction, ObjectDefinitionPickerInteraction, ObjectPickerInteraction, PickerSingleChoiceSuperInteraction, PickerSuperInteraction, ImmediateSuperInteraction, SuperInteraction, Interaction

Tunable.name: max_value
Tunable.description: Maximum price value for the new object.

Tunable.name: min_value
Tunable.description: Minimum price value for the new object.

TunableEnum.name: participant
TunableEnum.description: The participant of the interaction that will be used to filter the created object (being the created object of greater or equal value)
